mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES (SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd}, MEMBER_NM = #{memberName}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{memberPhone} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_ENROLL_DT, REPLY_STATUS FROM REPLY JOIN BOARD ON(PARENT_BOARD_NO=BOARD_NO)WHERE REPLY_MEMBER_NO = #{rerlyMemberNo} AND REPLY_STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_MEMBER_NO = #{rerlyMemberNo} AND REPLY_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_WRITER,BOARD_TYPE,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_ENROLL_DATE,BOARD_MODIFY_DATE,BOARD_STATUS,QUESTION_CODE,START_DATE,END_DATE,VIEWS,BOARD_CATEGORY FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_TYPE) WHERE BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL=#{email} AND MEMBER_STATUS='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_STATUS WHERE TRAINER_NO = 127 AND CLASS_CNT > 0
SELECT MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE FROM CLASS_STATUS JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_EMAIL=#{memberEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_EMAIL=#{memberEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_WRITER=#{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM PT WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_TIME
SELECT * FROM TRAINER_SCHEDULE WHERE TRAINER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_TIME

SELECT (SELECT MEMBER_NM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO=(SELECT DISTINCT TRAINER_NO FROM PT WHERE MEMBER_NO=44)) AS MEMBER_NM, SCHEDULE_TIME,(SELECT MEMBER_PHONE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO=(SELECT DISTINCT TRAINER_NO FROM PT WHERE MEMBER_NO=44)) AS MEMBER_PHONE FROM MEMBER JOIN PT USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO=44 ORDER BY SCHEDULE_TIME ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PT WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND SCHEDULE_TIME=#{scheduleTime}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO=#{reviewNo}
UPDATE CLASS_STATUS SET CLASS_CNT=CLASS_CNT+1 WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
UPDATE TRAINER_SCHEDULE SET SCHEDULE_STATUS='Y' WHERE SCHEDULE_TIME=#{scheduleTime}
